immunity_markdown: death effects, disease, mental, paralyzed, poison, unconscious
markdown:
**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 29 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 27 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 24 [Skeletal Tiger Lord](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2320) **Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 327 **Perception** +18 **Languages** [Hallit](/Languages.aspx?ID=37) **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +18 **Str** +6 **Dex** +4 **Con** +4 **Int** +0 **Wis** +4 **Cha** +0 **Items** [Breastplate](/Armor.aspx?ID=10), [Composite Longbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=74) (20 arrows), [Greatsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=24) --- **AC** 28 **Fort** +18 **Ref** +16 **Will** +16 **HP** 99 ([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42), [fast healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=15) 10) **Immunities** death effects, disease, mental, paralyzed, poison, unconscious **Resistances** cold 10, electricity 10, fire 10, piercing 10, slashing 10 **Rejuvenation** ([ <%TRAITS%48%%> divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=351) <%END>, [ <%TRAITS%117%%> necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117) When a skeletal Tiger Lord is destroyed <%END>, its bones clatter to the ground in a tangle and its armor and weapons crumble to dust. It automatically reforms with its armor and weapons intact) otherwise, the only way to permanently destroy a skeletal Tiger Lord is to reduce it to 0 Hit Points with positive damage or good damage.
**[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** greatsword +20 ([versatile P](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 1d12+10 slashing plus 2d6 negative **Ranged** composite longbow +18 ([deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [range increment 100 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254), [volley 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=201)), **Damage** 1d8+10 piercing
name: Skeletal Tiger Lord
